chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib

Interface HBCentralListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HBCentralListenerAdapter, HBCentralListenerHandler

    public interface HBCentralListener
    A callback to receive information from connected devices. Callbacks are initiated by calling the public methods of HBCentral for a specific device. This interface contains the callbacks of all supported services.
